text: Piet Wijnberg (20 October 1957 â€“ October 2021) was a Dutch professional footballer. He played as a central defender for SC 't Gooi, Utrecht, Ajax, Go Ahead Eagles, NEC, DS'79, Sparta and FC Hilversum. He also represented the Netherlands at under-21. Wijnberg was born in Hilversum. He died in October 2021, aged 63. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Dutch footballers Category:Sportspeople from Hilversum
title: Piet Wijnberg
